replies.body: IM A JHIN MAIN ACCEPT ME{{champion:202}} {{summoner:4}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} {{item:3031}}

I like the "Resistance Caitlyn" skin but why is her hair brown in the artwork and blue in the game? From what I have seen anyway. Is this intentional for some reason? I'd much prefer the brown hair on her. Will definitely be buying that "Arclight Vel'Koz" skin though!
